articles.title: Sensex Today LIVE Updates: Indices trade lower with Nifty around 18,700; smallcap index falls 1% - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates:  Top gainers on the Nifty includes Bharti Airtel, NTPC, Asian Paints, Bajaj Auto and Dr Reddy's Labs, while losers are Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports, BPCL, Hindalco Industries and Tech Mahindra. Among sectors, oil & …
